TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MatchAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MatchAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MatchAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示使用文字模式比對所尋獲之符合項目的屬性。

span.span: Represents the attributes of a match made using text pattern matching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字模式比對可讓 XML Web service 來運用現有的 HTML 內容剖析使用規則運算式。Text pattern matching allows an XML Web service to leverage existing HTML content by parsing it using regular expressions. XML Web service 會指定它想要剖析使用相符的項目為服務描述中的內容。an XML Web service specifies the content it wants to parse in a Service Description using match elements. 這些比對項目指定數個項目： 剖析以現有的 html 內容頁面、 剖析是否必須不區分大小寫，而且應該傳回內容符合規則運算式的執行個體數目的規則運算式。These match elements specify several items: the regular expression for parsing the contents of an existing HTML page, whether the parsing must be case-insensitive, and how many instances of content that matches the regular expression should be returned. Proxy 類別的方法時的用戶端來建立 proxy 類別，使用 Wsdl.exe 工具，包括詳述的相符項目服務描述中找到。When a client builds a proxy class using the Wsdl.exe tool, methods of the proxy class include a detailing the match elements found in the Service Description. 如需有關文字模式比對的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:建立剖析網頁內容的 Web 服務](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xxb0bsdh(v=vs.100))。For more information on text pattern matching, see [How to: Create Web Services That Parse the Contents of a Web Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xxb0bsdh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的模式。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified pattern. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |模式Pattern|`pattern` 參數的值。The value of the `pattern` parameter.| ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定相符項目所屬的群組。Use the property to specify a group that a match belongs to. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要從符合傳回的值之最大數量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of values to return from the match.

value.span: 要從符合傳回的值之最大數量。

span.span: The maximum number of values to return from the match.

value.span: 預設值為 –1，它指出傳回所有值。

span.span: The default value is -1, which refers to returning all values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 1 的值表示只傳回第一個符合項目。A value of 1 returns only the first match. 值為 -1，則會傳回所有符合項目。A value of -1 returns all matches. 此外，-1 值等於 ' \*' 的規則運算式中。Additionally, a value of -1 equates to an '\*' in a regular expression. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定規則運算式，表示要符合的值。Use the property to specify a regular expression that represents the value to match. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#4)]
